content: **a lovely taper-ended scarf with textured puff stitches down the center customizable for length width and yarn weight ** **size ** 58-65 x 2 75-3 5 /147-165 x 7-9 cm adjustable depending on yarn weight and hook size used and what width you prefer **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet special stitch instructions **yarn ** #3 dk weight tippy tree yarns super dk 100% superwash merino wool 231 yds/100 g or #4 worsted weight expression fiber arts buttery worsted 100% superwash merino wool 224 yds/100 g or suitable substitute 190-230 total yards if you keep the size range stated above **tools ** us size g+/7 4 5 mm crochet hook for dk weight us size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook for worsted weight yarn needle scissors blocking materials **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
